plantSummary: Chinese evergreens are popular indoor ornamental plants because they are easy to maintain.

maintenance.comment: These plants don't need much maintenance, just re-pot every two to three years.

watering.comment: Ensure that the soil is always moist, but use slightly less water in the winter.

lighting.comment: Give this plant a good amount of indoor light, but avoid direct sunlight.

environment.comment: The temperature should be between 65 and 80 degrees farenheit. Keep the himidity medium or high, otherwise the leaves will become dry.

image.credit: Forest and Kim Starr - Plants of Hawaii
